Package dev.orphoros.demo.amalgamlib.services

Class AuthorService

  • java.lang.Object
    • dev.orphoros.demo.amalgamlib.services.AuthorService
  • @Service
public class AuthorService
extends java.lang.Object
    Author Service

    This class is responsible validating parameters, checking for exceptions and connecting the AuthorController with the AuthorRepository.

    This class may throw HTTP status codes in the 400 range if an exception happened.

    HTTP status codes in the 500 range may be thrown as well if an uncaught exception happens.

    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Orphoros
    See Also:
    AutherController, AuthorService, AuthorRepository

    • Method Detail

      • getFilteredAuthors

        public java.util.List<Author> getFilteredAuthors​(java.lang.Boolean male,
                                                 java.lang.String name)
        Gives a list of filtered authors based on filter parameters.

        All parameters are optional for filtering

        Parameters:
        male - Gender of the author
        name - Keyword to be found in the name of the author (case sensitive)
        Returns:
        List of found authors
        Throws:
        BadRequestException - if the name is not null but empty

      • getAuthorByID

        public Author getAuthorByID​(java.lang.Long id)
        Finds an author by their corresponding ID
        Parameters:
        id - ID of the author to find
        Returns:
        Author who belongs to the ID
        Throws:
        NotFoundException - if the ID does not exist in the database
        BadRequestException - if the ID is not properly formatted

      • addNewAuthor

        public Author addNewAuthor​(Author a)
        Save a new author to the database
        Parameters:
        a - Author object to save
        Returns:
        Author object that has been successfully saved
        Throws:
        BadRequestException - if the author object is not properly formatted

      • deleteAuthor

        public void deleteAuthor​(java.lang.Long id)
        Delete an existing author from the database
        Parameters:
        id - ID of the existing author to be deleted
        Throws:
        BadRequestException - if the ID is not properly formatted
        NotFoundException - if the author does not exist in the database

      • updateAuthor

        public Author updateAuthor​(java.lang.Long id,
                           Author a)
        Update the values of an existing author in the database
        Parameters:
        id - ID of the existing author object
        a - Author object with the updated values (ID must be present as well)
        Returns:
        Author object with the new values that has been successfully updated
        Throws:
        BadRequestException - if the author object is not properly formatted or the IDs are incorrect
        NotFoundException - if the ID does not exist in the database

      • validateAuthor

        private void validateAuthor​(Author a)
        Validates an author object's properties
        Parameters:
        a - Author object to be validated
        Throws:
        BadRequestException - if validation failed

      • validateID

        private void validateID​(java.lang.Long id)
        Validates the format of an ID
        Parameters:
        id - ID to be validated
        Throws:
        BadRequestException - if validation failed
